title: Ballet Crash Course
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Huff, huff...... Maru is at her limit, zura~~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You worked very hard, Hanamaru. Let’s end today’s practice here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>I’ve been saved~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu. You’ve improved a lot. I can tell you that you’ve been practicing ballet at home.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru wanted to learn it perfectly and teach it to Ruby-chan and the others since you’ve been teaching Maru so diligently, Eli-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I suppose Aqours’s dance skills will become even more incredible. We won’t lose to you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru and Aqours will do their best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I’m looking forward to the next live concert then. Anyway, we should rehydrate with how much we’re sweating.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Okay~ Glug, glug...... Cold barley tea is so tasty~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Always replenish minerals after you’ve sweated hard! Here, let me wipe off your sweat for you. ......Alright!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
